address: 620 Newport Center Drive, Suite 200, Newport Beach, CA 92660
subHeading: Committed to delivering high-caliber legal representation.
valueProp: Stuart Kane LLP is committed to delivering the highest caliber of legal representation in the areas of real estate, employment, and litigation. We offer big-firm expertise, but with more personalized service, and at boutique law firm rates.

testimonalData.text: Stuart Kane LLP provided exceptional legal support for our business. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: The attorneys at Stuart Kane LLP are true professionals. Their expertise is unmatched.

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the guidance and representation I received from Stuart Kane LLP. They exceeded my expectations.
